definitions.definition: Inclined to drowse ; heavy with sleepiness
examples: I was feeling drowsy and so decided to make a cup of coffee to try to wake myself up.

definitions.definition: Causing someone to fall sleep or feel sleepy; lulling ; soporific .
examples: It was a warm, drowsy summer afternoon.

definitions.definition: Dull ; stupid . (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: Inclined to drowse ; heavy with sleepiness
secondary_definitions: Causing someone to fall sleep or feel sleepy; lulling ; soporific .
